page.title: 15DUNCOMBE SCHOOL, BENGEO
page.content: Duncombe school is in Bengeo, off the B158. It is an{independent}Church of England mixed primary school,housed in an old building, part of which used to be a hotel.There are 3\ acres of land. There are{200 pupils.}20% come from Hertford and 13% from Ware. The rest come from a wider catchment area. There is a{structured timetable}and} {uniform}is compulsory.All juniors have {homework}and there is a voluntary prep class.There are{examinations and tests Most leavers also go on to independent schools. There are 14 form teachers, 3 helping teachers and 6 for special subjects. Forms 3 and 4 do{science projects and go on{educational trips. There are{sports and swimming}lessons and lunchtime clubs. Children may have milk and packed or school lunch. There is a Parent's and Friend's association.
